rows.label: qst700203_msg0001
rows.name:
...Th-That's why I'm asking
why you're naked, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0002
rows.name: Huh? Are they arguing?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0003
rows.name:
I've never heard of a textile shop
where the owner is naked, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0004
rows.name:
E-Even if you say that, this
is Obibi's formal style, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0005
rows.name:
Ah! It's the customers from
before! I was waiting, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0006
rows.name:
What's wrong? It looked
like you were arguing...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0007
rows.name: Please, listen to me, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0008
rows.name:
This child from the Voltis Trade
Guild that you all brought to me...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0009
rows.name:
They certainly have incredible
business knowledge, mo.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0010
rows.name:
But, they say the reason
for the shop's slump is
because Obibi is naked, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0011
rows.name: What a rude child, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0012
rows.name: Of course I'd say that, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0013
rows.name:
...Dekudeku just had a look
around this textile shop, mo.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0014
rows.name:
Looking at the shop and its
products, the equipment and
sewing skills are quite good, mo.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0015
rows.name:
So, if we can create a new product
that captures the hearts of the Nopon,
a huge hit is not just a dream, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0016
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0017
rows.name:
If the shopkeeper selling it is
naked, it's a non-starter, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0018
rows.name:
For fashion-conscious Nopon, a
shop with a naked owner is a place
they'd never want to go, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0019
rows.name:
Now, now... I think you have a point,
but first, let's all calm down.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0020
rows.name:
That's right! I wouldn't care if the
shopkeeper was naked or whatever!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0021
rows.name:
That's only because you're
special, Your Highness.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0022
rows.name: Stop interrupting!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0023
rows.name:
Anyway... First, let's think about
what to do for this new product.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0024
rows.name:
If we want a product that's
popular with Nopon, it should
be something trendy, right?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0025
rows.name: Hmmm, even so...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0026
rows.name:
I don't know a thing about
Nopon fads and trends...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0027
rows.name: Me neither.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0028
rows.name: Mo... We're back to square one, mo...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0029
rows.name: Dekudeku... did I say that right?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0030
rows.name: Mo?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0031
rows.name:
You may be young, but you
are a member of the Voltis
Trade Guild, correct?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0032
rows.name:
For a guild of that stature,
wouldn't they know immediately
what is selling in Alst right now?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0033
rows.name: I see! Using the guild's information!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0034
rows.name:
As expected of you,
Minochi! You're sharp!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0035
rows.name:
Understood, mo! Please wait
while I try to remember, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0036
rows.name: Momomo...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0037
rows.name: Mo mo!?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0038
rows.name:
Come to think of it... Hats for Nopon
are a big hit right now in the Voltis
Trade Guild's apparel division, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0039
rows.name:
And what's more, there
shouldn't be that many sales
routes to Iira yet, mo.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0040
rows.name:
If we can make a hat that appeals to
the Nopon in Iira right now, this shop
is sure to make a huge profit, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0041
rows.name: Th-That's an amazing idea, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0042
rows.name:
I've dealt with hats a few
times before, so even Obibi
can make one, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0043
rows.name:
...Besides, if the product is a hat,
then it doesn't matter as much if
the shopkeeper is naked, mo...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0044
rows.name: Mo? Did you say something, mo?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0045
rows.name:
Now that it's decided, let's
make a prototype first, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0046
rows.name:
Right now, cute and casual
style hats are popular with
fashionable Nopon, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0047
rows.name:
The cute style is a knit
hat that fits snugly on a
Nopon's adorable head...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0048
rows.name:
The casual style is a cap
with a simple design and a
single accent that shines...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0049
rows.name:
...A design like that is
sure to be a huge hit, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0050
rows.name:
Shopkeeper-san! To make these, how
many materials do you want, mo?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0051
rows.name: Momo... Let me think for a bit, mo...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0052
rows.name: A cute feeling... A casual feeling...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0053
rows.name: Mo! I have a general idea, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0054
rows.name: What!? Already!?

rows.label: qst700203_msg0055
rows.name:
Maybe she's amazing...
even if she is naked.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0056
rows.name:
I'm about to list the materials,
so please listen carefully, mo.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0057
rows.name: First, for the cute-style knit hat...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0058
rows.name:
I need four Cotton Branches,
two Angel's Sage, and one
Sunflower Rogue, mo.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0059
rows.name: Next, for the casual-style cap...

rows.label: qst700203_msg0060
rows.name:
I'll need four Corkscrew
Creepers, three Panda Pansies,
and one Floral Soil, mo.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0061
rows.name:
These materials can only be found
in either Iira or Gula, so we'll
need to search both, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0062
rows.name: ...And that's that, mo.

rows.label: qst700203_msg0063
rows.name:
I'd like to ask all of you to
gather the hat materials, mo!

rows.label: qst700203_msg0064
rows.name:
First, let's complete the hats
and get this shop revitalization
off the ground, mo!
